detail: Shows the list of all available commands and their details.
Creates a link to invite the bot to another server.

Downloads a user's favorites from SoundCloud (Overwrites any previous)
	<user_permalink> ~ Found in the URL for a soundcloud user
		(Ex: https://soundcloud.com/THIS_VALUE)
Shows the list of users whose Soundcloud favorites are in the database
Shows the list of songs in the queue

Adds items to the queue
	<query> ~ Search terms for a song. Queues the first result from youtube.
	<specific> = <user_data>+ &| <yt_url> &| <sc_url>
		<user_data> = <user_permalink> <range>
			<user_permalink> ~ Same as above
			<range> ~ Specifies range of the user's music list to use. Valid syntax is below.
				[X] ~ Means select the first X songs in the list (Most recent favorites)
				[-X] ~ Means select the last X songs in the list (Least recent favorites)
				[X,Y] ~ Select all songs from X to Y (X & Y can also be negative like above)
				[ALL] ~ Select all songs in the list
		<yt_url> ~ An url for a YouTube video or playlist
		<sc_url> ~ An url for a SoundCloud video or playlist
	Optional Flags:
		--shuffle ~ Shuffle the new list before adding to the queue
		--next ~ Add the items to the head of the queue
Shows current volume % or makes volume equal to <newVolume>
Makes bot join the voice channel you are in
Starts playing music from the queue (Bot must be in a voice channel)
Skips the current song in the queue
Stops playing music and leaves voice channel
Tells the bot to shut down.
